title: LFM Silver/Bronze, serious semi-serious, Ranked team LF Mid/Top
body:
Thanks for reading the post first off.
We are looking for a Brisbane based player that is okay with going to G-castle in a couple of weeks to spam team ranked and get better as a team.
If you are prone to flaming then you need not apply.
Looking for a mid laner preferably but we will take a top laner because we have a player that can adjust.
If you want to apply please fill out the following:
IGN:
Rank:
Preferred role:
Best champions in said role:
TS:
Play style (aggressive, passive):
Preferred play style (Assassin, Utility, Tank, mage, etc):
Can you shot call/are you a vocal player:
If you don't want to apply on this site then add me in game, my IGN: Xquishy
Thanks.

replies.body: Hey im from brisbane and pretty keen. will add you
then y not just add me up gbg727  ^^ i mainly play mid only XD sometimes sup n top if i dun get mid, also my history seems bad but not my stats {{summoner:31}} i will login in 2 hours study time :/
wow wish this was for Melbourne instead  :/ {{summoner:3}}
You can still apply provided that you are available while we are all ready to play as a team.{{summoner:6}}

IGN: Deep Sanity
Rank: Bronze 5 (should be higher tbh)
Preferred role: Top or jg mostly but can be flexible any play any role
Best champions in said role: Darius, Trynda, Fiora - any top laner really
TS: yes and skype
Play style (aggressive, passive): Both
Preferred play style (Assassin, Utility, Tank, mage, etc): any style suited to the team or the counter pick
Can you shot call/are you a vocal player: vocal

IGN: ADG SHINOBI
Rank : Bronze 4
Pref role : Adc/mid
Best champs in those roles: adc - cait, corki, kalista------- mid - Ahri, Leblanc, annie, ziggs
I have skype but can easily get team speak
Play style - Heavy farm and agro in 1v1 situations
I play mostly marksmen and mages i lean towards the carry role more than utility type but i can play that style also.
Im vocal but prefer not to shotcall as i focus a lot on the laning phase and then team fights.
